tagline.en: The Dapp developer Block Producer Candidate
tagline.zh: The Dapp developer Block Producer Candidate

introduce.en: We are a diversified team who live in a variety of locations across the world. After consultation with the EOS community, we have decided to structure ourselves as a DAT; A Decentralised Autonomous Team. The reason we have done this is because we want to be as politically and geographically diversified as possible.
introduce.zh: 我們是一個多元化的團隊，生活在世界各地。在諮詢EOS社區之後，我們決定將自己構建為DAT;一個分散的自治隊。我們這樣做的原因是因為我們希望盡可能在政治和地理上多樣化。
